item.title: SeaChat Release History
item.description: 2/19/2025 # New Features and Improvements # Evaluation Testing: Users can now assess AI agent responses by providing test sets, each containing a user query, a gold response, and optional conversation history. The AI agentâ€™s response is compared against the gold response, with results displaying overall correctness and individual sample accuracy. Users can refine their AI agent and run evaluations to continuously improve performance. Conversation Label Editing: Users can now create, edit, and delete chat labels directly from the Labels page.
